title: Immediate effect of collapse of Soviet Union

content.question: Which of the following was the most immediate effect of the collapse of the communist regime in the Soviet Union?

choices.label: United States involvement in wars in Iraq and Afghanistan
The Chinese communist governmentâ€™s institution of market-reform policies
The end of the Cold War
The expansion of the European Union to include countries in Eastern Europe

content.answer: The end of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
